tool_description: Analyzes document images to detect handwritten text regions and assess handwriting characteristics for specialized OCR processing.

image_path.description: Path to document image for handwriting analysis

error_messages: Image file not found: Verify the image_path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported image format: Use JPEG, PNG, or TIFF formats.
Analysis failed: Image quality may be insufficient for handwriting detection.
Processing timeout: Large images may require longer processing time.
usage: Provide image_path to analyze for handwritten content. Use before OCR processing to optimize text extraction settings for mixed print/handwritten documents.

handwriting_detected.description: Whether handwritten text was found in the document

handwriting_percentage.description: Estimated percentage of document that is handwritten (0-100)

handwriting_regions.description: Coordinates and descriptions of handwritten areas

recommended_ocr_settings.description: Suggested OCR parameters for optimal handwriting recognition
